channel.title: Charge Change on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Charge Change on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Future of EV Charging Can Be Found at Your Local Gas Station
item.description: After a six-month pause, $5 billion in US federal electric-vehicle-charging money is now flowing back to the states—with a new catch that could make some gas station operators very happy.
